pkgmetadata.longdescription: Factor-Augmented Sparse Regression Tuning-Free Testing // The 'FAS' package implements the bootstrap method for the tuning parameter selection and tuning-free inference on sparse regression coefficient vectors. Currently, the test could be applied to linear and factor-augmented sparse regressions, see Lederer Vogt (2021, JMLR) https://www.jmlr.org/papers/volume22/20-539/20-539.pdf and Beyhum Striaukas (2023) arXiv:2307.13364.
